RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 11600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since July 10, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Ohio Regist ered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MERRY OF SOUL settled right behind leader to the half, took over into the turn and cleared in the final furlong and held sway to the wire. HONEYBELL broke slow from the gate, ran on into the turn while coming on too late. ARKLAHOMA SOUL tried to keep up from inside, gave in through the lane showed. WENDY'S SONG lagged back to the turn and lacked a late response in the stretch run . ZUPITA lunged from the gate, rushed between horses, used up faded.

ENTRY.NAME: Honeybell
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke slow from the gate, ran on outside in the stretch coming on

ENTRY.NAME: Arklahoma Soul
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep up from inside, gave in through the lane showed

ENTRY.NAME: Zupita
ENTRY.COMMENT: lunged from the gate, rushed between horses, used up faded

ENTRY.NAME: Wendy's Song
ENTRY.COMMENT: lagged back to the turn and lacked a late response

ENTRY.NAME: Merry of Soul
ENTRY.COMMENT: right behind leader to the half, took over turn cleared held sway

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 48. Allowance Purse 25600. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 10, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances). .
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WHYNAUGHTY awkward start, recovered, ran up three wide, cleared late under stout handling. OUR LAST SONG inside to duel leader to turn, could not hold off winner,in a gutsy effort to the wire. SWEET AS MERRIE quick speed outside, dueled to the turn, gave in stretch run. JUST ZOEY inside run to turn, angled out with no late response. GIMME CLEARANCE always trailed with little response throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Whynaughty
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward start, recovered, ran up three wide, cleared late

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet as Merrie
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick speed outside, dueled to the turn, gave in stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Just Zoey
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside run to turn, angled out with no late response

ENTRY.NAME: Our Last Song
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside to duel leader to turn, could not hold off winner, gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Gimme Clearance
ENTRY.COMMENT: always trailed with little response

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 67. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since July 10, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registe red Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PINKY TUSCADERO had a quick start, chased leader to the to turn, dueled into stretch and ran off through the final furlong under good handling to the wire. BEACH KITTEN inside speed to the front collared past quarter pole, stayed gamely for place spot. COMPETITIVE FIRE no speed form the gate, lagged back, coming on just missed 2nd. MARKET OF STOCKS ran on smoothly to the quarter pole with no late kick to the wire. MI ENLACE never threatened throughout. WINDOW SHAKER rushed to keep up from inside to turn with nothing left.

ENTRY.NAME: Competitive Fire
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed form the gate, lagged back, coming on just missed 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Window Shaker
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to keep up from inside to turn with nothing left

ENTRY.NAME: Beach Kitten
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed to the front collared past quarter pole, stayed 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Mi Enlace
ENTRY.COMMENT: never threatened throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Market of Stocks
ENTRY.COMMENT: ran on smoothly to the quarter pole with no late kick to the wire

ENTRY.NAME: Pinky Tuscadero
ENTRY.COMMENT: quick start, chased to turn, dueled into stretch, cleared stretch

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON THREE RACES IN 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since July 10, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MY ANGELICA sharp speed to front dueled to the half, shook free while ridden out. HOLDONTOYOURTIARA chased top pair to the stretch kicked in late outside for place. MY ROSIE dueled to turn with winner, turned back for show spot. OUT ATTHE SPEEDWAY raced along evenly throughout with no late response in stretch. AND I KNOW bit tardy from the gate rushed inside with nothing left from turn. EIDA'S STORM broke sharp outside while turning in a dull effort.

ENTRY.NAME: And I Know
ENTRY.COMMENT: bit tardy from the gate rushed inside with nothing left from turn

ENTRY.NAME: My Angelica
ENTRY.COMMENT: sharp speed to front dueled to the half, shook free ridden out

ENTRY.NAME: My Rosie
ENTRY.OWNER: Riley Barbara J and Ouzts Toni
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled to turn with winner, turned back for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Holdontoyourtiara
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased top pair to the stretch kicked in late outside for place

ENTRY.NAME: Eida's Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharp outside while turning in a dull effort

ENTRY.NAME: Out Atthe Speedway
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly throughout with no late response in stretch

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 5 5F Turf CR: 83. Allowance Purse 17800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 10, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Pref erred). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at Five Furlongs.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TROUBLE MAKING no speed to the turn with a late rush to edge clear late. MORNIN' BOSS went up to duel leader to the turn, edged clear stretch run down. HARTFUL HOPE saved ground to the stretch, roused on to close the gap late. ONE MORE NIGHT awkward start from gate, eventful trip to stretch finished well. MY HEAD HURTS raced along evenly from outside with no late kick when needed. FAST TRANSIT close up to turn with tough navigating in stretch and took a, bad step while changing leads at the eighth pole with no late gain. MOTOWN MISCHIEF speed to the front, battled to the quarter pole, gave in readily.

ENTRY.NAME: Hartful Hope
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground to the stretch, roused on to close the gap late

ENTRY.NAME: Motown Mischief
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the front, battled to the quarter pole, gave in readily

ENTRY.NAME: Mornin' Boss
ENTRY.COMMENT: went up to duel leader to the turn, edged clear stretch run down

ENTRY.NAME: One More Night
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward start from gate, eventful trip to stretch finished well

ENTRY.NAME: Fast Transit
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up to turn with tough navigating in stretch, bad step 1/8p

ENTRY.NAME: Trouble Making
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to the turn with a late rush to edge clear late

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Rebel Racing LLC, Rowland Hancock & David Walker

ENTRY.NAME: My Head Hurts
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly from outside with no late kick when needed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 6 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 85. Claiming Purse 11600. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since July 10, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Pric e $10,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $6,250).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OLIVIA'S JOY raced along outside to the far turn, kept on to earn the nod on the wire. AUNT RUTH pressed leader to the half, stayed game to stretch but outgamed in the final stages with a solid effort. WHAT'S SO FUNNY had an inside trip with a good effort in the stretch for the show spot. I SAID HEY had speed to the front, stayed clear into the stretch but weakened in the final seventy yards. PER THE HORSE RACING INTEGRITY AND WELFARE UNIT, I SAID HEY HAS BEEN DQ'D DUE TO A POSITIVE TEST.

ENTRY.NAME: I Said Hey
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the front, stayed clear into the stretch weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: What's So Funny
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside trip with a good effort in the stretch for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Aunt Ruth
ENTRY.OWNER: Riley Barbara Ouzts Toni and Mattingly David H
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed leader to the half, stayed game to the stretch outgamed

ENTRY.NAME: Olivia's Joy
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along outside to the far turn, kept on to earn the nod

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 7 5F Turf CR: 68. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16200. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $20,000). (If transferred to the Main Track, this ra ce will be run at Five Furlongs.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HARMONICA hooked in a ding battle from the start, stayed game to prevail on the wire. MISS BEE HAPPY stayed on to the stretch, kept on in the final furlong, gamely. HAZANNE good position to turn, ran into traffic, ran on with a bid. HOLD MY CROWN shuffled back from inside from the gate, raced rank turn improved. AMATTEROFPRINCIPLE outside run to the turn could not keep up in the stretch faltered. WILL VIRGINIA DARE slow start, never menace. HOPEFUL SPIRIT between horses early on, shuffled back to the turn, empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Hold My Crown
ENTRY.COMMENT: shuffled back from inside from the gate, raced rank turn improved

ENTRY.NAME: Will Virginia Dare
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow start, never menace

ENTRY.NAME: Hazanne
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position to turn, ran into traffic, ran on with a bid

ENTRY.NAME: Hopeful Spirit
ENTRY.COMMENT: between horses early on, shuffled back to the turn, empty

ENTRY.NAME: Harmonica
ENTRY.COMMENT: hooked in a ding battle from the start, stayed game to prevail

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Bee Happy
ENTRY.COMMENT: stayed on to the stretch, kept on in the final furlong, gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Amatterofprinciple
ENTRY.COMMENT: outside run to the turn could not keep up in the stretch faltered

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE FEBRUARY 10, 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FEELING IT galloped along backstretch off rail,bold three wide run, drew off under steady handling to the wire proving much the best today. EMPEROR'S GOLD pressed pace to the half inside, lost position to far turn, angled out into the stretch and ran on for place spot. FULCO rushed to the front, dueled to the half cleared far turn but faltered sow third. BRODYTHEOXMAN good position to the half, shuffled back,far turn, re-rallied late to improve late. LONG BEACH KID raced along into first turn between horses, rough trip tried hard. TORNADO BOY tried to keep up to far turn, gave in and weakened in the stretch. SHAKEM N BREAKEM slow into stride while racing wide run through the first turn, stayed off rail to far turn and lost ground while going evenly throughout. ALTERNATE NIGHTS slow start, galloped along while never menacing throughout. PER THE HORSE RACING INTEGRITY AND WELFARE UNIT, BRODYTHEOXMAN HAS BEEN DQ'D FOR A POSITIVE TEST.

ENTRY.NAME: Emperor's Gold
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace to the half inside, lost position, angled out for 2d

ENTRY.NAME: Alternate Nights
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow start, galloped along while never menacing throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Fulco
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to the front, dueled to the half cleared far turn faltered

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Brodytheoxman
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position to the half, shuffled back,far turn, rerallied late

ENTRY.NAME: Long Beach Kid
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along into first turn between horses, rough trip tried hard

ENTRY.NAME: Feeling It
ENTRY.COMMENT: galloped along backstretch off rail,bold three wide run, drew off

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Martha Jane Mulholland, John HenryMulholland & Tom Grether

ENTRY.NAME: Tornado Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep up to far turn, gave in and weakened in the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Shakem N Breakem
ENTRY.COMMENT: wide run first turn, stayed off rail to far turn, lost ground
